properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Iwo to fe wa la o ma sin titi
Oluwa olorewa
Iwo to nsowa n'nu idanwo aye
Mimo, logo ola re

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Iwo to nsure s'ohun t'a gbinsaye
T'aiye fi nrohun je o
Awon to mura lato ma s'oto
Won tun nyo n'nu is Re

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Baba iwol'a o ma sin
Baba iwol'ao ma bo
Iwo to fewa l'a o ma sin titi
Mimo l'ogo ola re

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Iwo to nf'agan l'omo to npe ranse
Ninu ola Re to ga
Eni t'o ti s'alaileso si dupe
Fun'se ogo ola Re

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Eni t'ebi npa le ri ayo ninu
Agbara nla Re to ga
Awon to ti nwoju Re fun anu
Won tun nyo n'nu ise Re

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
F'alafia Re fun ijo Re l'aye
K'ore-ofe Re ma ga
K'awon eni T'ire ko ma yo titi
Ninu ogo ise Re
